channel.title: Memory Leak?
channel.description: [url='https://imgur.com/JHghd']https://imgur.com/JHghd[/url] ![](upload://fReKERuaIzGUaK52PaAVdhhbab5.png) Sorry, I can't remember the exact details for how long I was playing, so here's a rough description. Started out at the point were you dash through the freezer area with environmental cold damage and ended at the dam section with the helicopter. After I died, the game crashed with the above error message. In case the image disappears, it reads: Engine Error, Can't load lump 53, allocation of 6789549 bytes failed!!! System Specs: AMD Phenom II x4 @ 3.2 GHz 12 GB RAM Radeon HD 5770 x2 Windows 7 64-bit hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_22T5_22_30C0.mdmp (99.8 KB)

item.title: Memory Leak?
item.dc:creator: Dolorous
item.description:
https://imgur.com/JHghd

Sorry, I can’t remember the exact details for how long I was playing, so here’s a rough description. Started out at the point were you dash through the freezer area with environmental cold damage and ended at the dam section with the helicopter. After I died, the game crashed with the above error message.

In case the image disappears, it reads: Engine Error, Can’t load lump 53, allocation of 6789549 bytes failed!!!

System Specs:
AMD Phenom II x4 @ 3.2 GHz
12 GB RAM
Radeon HD 5770 x2
Windows 7 64-bit
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_22T5_22_30C0.mdmp (99.8 KB)
